content: round 13 18 23 *k1 k2tog ssk k1 p2 repeat from * twice more 6 sts decreased 18 sts decrease round 14 19 24 *k2tog ssk p2 repeat from * twice more 6 sts decreased 12 sts cut working yarn leaving a tail approximately 6-8 inches long thread this tail onto a tapestry needle and draw through remaining 12 stitches on your needle tug on this tail until the hole at the top of the hat closes weave in remaining ends and block ©2022 refracted light fiber arts for personal use only www refractedlightfiberarts com | instagram @refractedlightfiberarts | refractedlightfiberarts@gmail com 7 connect need pattern support or have any questions feel free to email me at refractedlightfiberarts@gmail com want to see more of my work or connect on social media website www refractedlightfiberarts com ravelry refracted light fiber arts instagram @refractedlightfiberarts feel free to share your wips and finished projects on social media using the hashtags #elanorhat and #refractedlightfiberarts thank you so much for supporting my little creative knitting endeavor it s truly means a great deal to me happy knitting ethan pyle ©2022 refracted light fiber arts for personal use only www refractedlightfiberarts com | instagram @refractedlightfiberarts | refractedlightfiberarts@gmail com
